lines: You are in a restaurant with three of your friends, and it is time to pay the check. The bill is $50 (allow another ten for a tip).
*selectable_if (false) #WAIT FOR SOMEONE ELSE TO PICK UP THE TAB
#WAIT FOR SOMEONE ELSE TO PICK UP THE TAB
#WAIT FOR SOMEONE ELSE TO PICK UP THE TAB
You can't afford to pay for that kind of meal. You don't have that kind of money. Your friends resent your playing the part of the big spender, then not coming through.
Your Social status takes a rise. Resources decline.
This suggestion seems sensible and practical (if not somewhat frugal). How do you want to handle the bill?
#EACH PERSON PAYS HIS OR HER OWN AMOUNT
You whip out your pocket calculator and tell everyone what they owe. You don't want to be cheated or overspend. Your part comes out to $6.
A sensible socially acceptable way of doing things. Everyone had similar portions of food, so a few cents here and there among friends doesn't seem to make a big difference.

The check arrives, and you wait for someone else to make the first move. You know from past experience that the guy directly to your left has made a big deal out of paying for everyone whenever a group goes out. His father is some rich
banker, and this is how he gets his jollies. He is just waiting for someone else to make a gesture so he can upstage him.
No one is making a move. He'd never let a WOMAN pay. Maybe you can rush things along by offering to pick up the tab.
You say, "Don't worry guys, it's on me." The guy to your left says, "Thanks. I'll tell you what -- I'll take everyone to the movies, on ME. I'll go to the telephone and call one of Daddy's limos."
You don't have enough money to pick up the tab. Your friends figure out what you were trying to do and think you are a jerk.

Eventually the guy to your left offers to pick up the tab, but then apologizes, saying he doesn't have enough cash. He checks the cashier at the restaurant and is told that they do not accept credit cards. Everyone must pay for himself
You don't even have $9 to your name! Your friends think you are a big moocher, which, by the way, you ARE!
